summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the 1975 Budget of the Department of Community Development; establishing in said Budget as of January 1, 1975, certain program categories and expenditure allowances to provide for urban renewal salaries and other urban renewal costs and expenses by reappropriation and transfer from certain objects of expenditure in said 1975 Budget, and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
